INSERT INTO TB_EMPINFO (EMPID, EMPNO, EMPNAME, COM_CODE, EMPJIKW, EMPGRAD, EMPHANDPHONE, EMPTELPHONE, EMPMAIL, AUTHOR_CODE, EMP_STATE, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (#{userId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userNo}, #{userName}, #{comCode}, #{userPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userRank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userCellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'ROLE_USER', #{userState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW());
